name: Issue Notice of Cancellation (NOC) for Bound Applications
description: Underwriters can initiate NOC process for bound applications through right-click menu actions in the EOX UW list view

background.text: I am logged in to the EOX application as an Underwriter
I am on the UW list view page

scenarios.name: Successfully issue NOC for a bound application

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the bound application
I click on the 'Issue NOC' action button
I should see a pop-up message 'Please complete the NOC in IMS before performing further activities'
the application status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'

scenarios.name: NOC action button appears only for bound applications

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the bound application
I should see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu
the action button should be enabled

scenarios.name: Multiple bound applications can have NOC issued

steps.text: there are multiple applications with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the first bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
I acknowledge the pop-up message
I right-click on another bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
both applications should have status 'Notice of Cancellation'

scenarios.name: Pop-up message acknowledgment updates status correctly

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
I acknowledge the pop-up message
the application status should automatically change to 'Notice of Cancellation'
the status change should be visible immediately in the list view

scenarios.name: Application with Notice of Cancellation status available for IMS processing

steps.text: I have issued NOC for a bound application
the application status is 'Notice of Cancellation'
I navigate to IMS
I go to Policy > Notice of Cancellation
I should be able to change the status to Notice of Cancellation in IMS

scenarios.name: Issue NOC maintains data consistency across sessions

steps.text: I have issued NOC for a bound application
the application status is 'Notice of Cancellation'
I log out and log back in
I navigate to the UW list view
the application status should remain as 'Notice of Cancellation'

scenarios.name: Issue NOC action not available for non-bound applications

steps.text: there is an application with 'Pending' status in the list
I right-click on the pending application
I should not see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu

scenarios.name: Cannot issue NOC for applications with existing Notice of Cancellation status

steps.text: there is an application with 'Notice of Cancellation' status in the list
I right-click on the application
I should not see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu
the application status should remain unchanged

scenarios.name: System handles NOC pop-up dismissal without status change

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
I dismiss the pop-up without acknowledging
the application status should remain as 'Bound'
no NOC process should be initiated

scenarios.name: Issue NOC validation with various application statuses

steps.text: there is an application with <status> status in the list
I right-click on the application
I should see <result>

scenarios.name: Edge case - Issue NOC immediately after application becomes bound

steps.text: an application has just changed status to 'Bound'
I refresh the UW list view
I right-click on the newly bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
the NOC process should initiate successfully
the status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'

scenarios.name: Edge case - Maximum character limit in pop-up message display

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I right-click on the bound application
I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
the pop-up message should display completely without truncation
the message should be 'Please complete the NOC in IMS before performing further activities'

scenarios.name: Alternative flow - Issue NOC using keyboard navigation

steps.text: there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
I navigate to the bound application using keyboard
I press the context menu key
I select 'Issue NOC' action using keyboard
the NOC process should initiate successfully
the application status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'

gherkin_content:
Feature: Issue Notice of Cancellation (NOC) for Bound Applications
  Underwriters can initiate NOC process for bound applications through right-click menu actions in the EOX UW list view

  Background:
    Given I am logged in to the EOX application as an Underwriter
    And I am on the UW list view page

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully issue NOC for a bound application
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the bound application
    And I click on the 'Issue NOC' action button
    Then I should see a pop-up message 'Please complete the NOC in IMS before performing further activities'
    And the application status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: NOC action button appears only for bound applications
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the bound application
    Then I should see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu
    And the action button should be enabled

  @positive @multiple-records
  Scenario: Multiple bound applications can have NOC issued
    Given there are multiple applications with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the first bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    And I acknowledge the pop-up message
    And I right-click on another bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    Then both applications should have status 'Notice of Cancellation'

  @positive @status-update
  Scenario: Pop-up message acknowledgment updates status correctly
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    And I acknowledge the pop-up message
    Then the application status should automatically change to 'Notice of Cancellation'
    And the status change should be visible immediately in the list view

  @positive @integration
  Scenario: Application with Notice of Cancellation status available for IMS processing
    Given I have issued NOC for a bound application
    And the application status is 'Notice of Cancellation'
    When I navigate to IMS
    And I go to Policy > Notice of Cancellation
    Then I should be able to change the status to Notice of Cancellation in IMS

  @positive @persistence
  Scenario: Issue NOC maintains data consistency across sessions
    Given I have issued NOC for a bound application
    And the application status is 'Notice of Cancellation'
    When I log out and log back in
    And I navigate to the UW list view
    Then the application status should remain as 'Notice of Cancellation'

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Issue NOC action not available for non-bound applications
    Given there is an application with 'Pending' status in the list
    When I right-click on the pending application
    Then I should not see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Cannot issue NOC for applications with existing Notice of Cancellation status
    Given there is an application with 'Notice of Cancellation' status in the list
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should not see the 'Issue NOC' action button in the context menu
    And the application status should remain unchanged

  @negative @user-cancellation
  Scenario: System handles NOC pop-up dismissal without status change
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    And I dismiss the pop-up without acknowledging
    Then the application status should remain as 'Bound'
    And no NOC process should be initiated

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Issue NOC validation with various application statuses
    Given there is an application with <status> status in the list
    When I right-click on the application
    Then I should see <result>

  @edge-case @timing
  Scenario: Edge case - Issue NOC immediately after application becomes bound
    Given an application has just changed status to 'Bound'
    When I refresh the UW list view
    And I right-click on the newly bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    Then the NOC process should initiate successfully
    And the status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'

  @edge-case @ui
  Scenario: Edge case - Maximum character limit in pop-up message display
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I right-click on the bound application
    And I click on 'Issue NOC' action button
    Then the pop-up message should display completely without truncation
    And the message should be 'Please complete the NOC in IMS before performing further activities'

  @alternative-flow @accessibility
  Scenario: Alternative flow - Issue NOC using keyboard navigation
    Given there is an application with 'Bound' status in the list
    When I navigate to the bound application using keyboard
    And I press the context menu key
    And I select 'Issue NOC' action using keyboard
    Then the NOC process should initiate successfully
    And the application status should change to 'Notice of Cancellation'
